onBlock.guildOnly: The ``%s`` command must be used in a server channel.
onBlock.nsfw: The ``%s`` command can only be used in NSFW channels.
onBlock.permission: You do not have permission to use the ``%s`` command.
onBlock.throttling: You may not use the ``{{name}}`` command again for another {{seconds}} seconds.

clientPermissions.one: I need the {{permission}} permission for the ``{{name}}`` command to work.
clientPermissions.more:
I need the following permissions for the ``{{name}}`` command to work:
{{permissions}}

permissions.noADMINISTRATOR: Only administrators may change the command prefix.

prefix.resetPrefix: Reset the command prefix to the default (currently %s).
